title: spiritual growth
comment: Scripture uses a number of images to emphasise that believers are meant to grow in their faith, understanding, holiness and commitment. It also provides advice on how this may be achieved.

children.title: spiritual growth, nature of
children.comment: Having given spiritual life to his people, God expects them to grow to maturity.

children.title: God desires the spiritual growth of his people
Christlikeness is the goal of spiritual growth
spiritual growth, means of
children.comment: God has provided various means by which believers may grow spiritually.

children.title: God supplies the resources for spiritual growth
God's people must make efforts to grow spiritually
The role of the Holy Spirit in spiritual growth
God will bring the spiritual growth of believers to completion
